rules_text:
When Gate of Realms enters, you may search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put that card into your hand. If you do, shuffle.
{10}, {T}: Gate of Realms deals 3 damage to any target. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each different name among lands you control.
flavor_text: [i]“Everybody's gone. I've been here for too long.”[/i]
